title: Gifts Americans are planning to purchase for Valentine 's Day by gender 2020
summary: This grouped bar chart shows Share of respondents on the Y-axis for 27 different Races for 2 groups Women, and Men that are presented on the X-axis.
Race Chocolates had the maximum Share of respondents among all 2 groups, and it was for Men. The minimum Share of respondents was observed in Race Mixtape for Women.
There is a gap of 54.0 between the highest and lowest Share of respondents found for Men in Race Chocolates and Home decor.
Averaging all 2 groups Women, and Men, the Race Dinner out is the maximum Share of respondents and Couple's gym membership is the minimum Share of respondents.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 27 different Races on X-axis for 2 groups Women, and Men. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of respondents.
Out of all 2 groups, Men had the highest Share of respondents for Race Chocolates and Women had the lowest Share of respondents for Race Mixtape.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Share of respondents on the Y-axis for 27 different Races for 2 groups Women, and Men that are presented on the X-axis.
Race Chocolates had the maximum Share of respondents among all 2 groups, and it was for Men. The minimum Share of respondents was observed in Race Mixtape for Women.
There is a gap of 54.0 between the highest and lowest Share of respondents found for Men in Race Chocolates and Home decor.
Averaging all 2 groups Women, and Men, the Race Dinner out is the maximum Share of respondents and Couple's gym membership is the minimum Share of respondents.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 27 different Races on X-axis for 2 groups Women, and Men. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of respondents.
Out of all 2 groups, Men had the highest Share of respondents for Race Chocolates and Women had the lowest Share of respondents for Race Mixtape.
For Race Chocolates, Men had the highest Share of respondents among all 27 Races and it has the lowest Share of respondents in Race Home decor.
The maximum Share of respondents for Men that was found in Race Chocolates was 0 times larger than the minimum Share of respondents observed in Race Home decor.
Out of all 2 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum Share of respondents was found in case of Women.
Averaging all 2 groups Women, and Men, the Race Dinner out is the maximum Share of respondents and Couple's gym membership is the minimum Share of respondents.
